function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of infection through shared surfaces and common facilities in residential complexes","Impact":"Panic and difficulty in obtaining food and medicine due to complete shut down of residential complexes","Mitigation":"Implementation of measures to prevent surface transmission and support self-sufficiency during lockdown periods","Technologies":"Touchless door systems, antimicrobial surfaces, ventilation systems, and contactless delivery systems","People":"Residents of residential complexes","Owner":"Architects, property managers, and building owners"},{"Description":"Psychological impact and discontent among residents due to lack of preparation for epidemics in residential buildings","Impact":"Panic, discontent, and attempts to break out of residential complexes, leading to potential security issues","Mitigation":"Incorporation of pandemic-resilient design principles in new apartment buildings and adaptation of existing buildings to support self-sufficiency and disease resilience","Technologies":"Modular and flexible design, efficient ventilation systems, and sustainable food and resource systems","People":"Residents of residential complexes, architects, property managers, building owners","Owner":"Architects, property managers, building owners"},{"Description":"Need for additional spaces in apartments to support pandemic-resilient living","Impact":"Requirement for re-designing and adapting existing apartment spaces to accommodate pandemic-resilient features","Mitigation":"Review and modification of apartment layout and design to incorporate additional spaces for self-sufficiency and disease resilience","Technologies":"Modular and flexible design, efficient ventilation systems, and sustainable food and resource systems","People":"Residents of apartments, architects, property managers, building owners","Owner":"Architects, property managers, building owners"}]}
